subject: Order SSN6008
description_text:
Simsonn Team,

I am writing to check on the status of my order, SSN6008.

I paid for express shipping, but it has been one week and I have not seen
any updates regarding the delivery. Given the delay, I am concerned that I
am not receiving the express service I paid for.

Could you please provide an update on the current status of my shipment and
look into why there has been no progress?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,

Stephen Tassinaro

conversations.body_text: Hi Stephen Tassinaro,  ​Because this product needed an upgrade, it has been out of stock for two weeks. Currently, we have completed the upgrade and arranged for shipment on the 17th. By then, you will receive the latest product with an improved experience. We sincerely apologize for the delay and any inconvenience this may have caused you.
Hi Stephen Tassinaro,  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047238967573

Hi Simsonn Team,

Thank you for the update. I appreciate you sending me the newest version of
the product!

Best regards,

Stephen Tassinaro


On Sun, Jan 18, 2026 at 10:55 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Stephen Tassinaro,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.Wish you a pleasant day.
